title: Summoner icon
body:
Hello, about the gift rakan or xayah champion thing.

I send to a friend rakan at 4/22 and i havent got my summoner icon yet.
Do i have to wait more for my icon or i have to contact riot ?

Thank you for reading my post have a nice day.

replies.body: The icons should be all be given out by May 10th (2 weeks after the [**event ends**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions)). and if you still haven't gotten yours by then hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get that sorted out!
Hiya! What about the other one from playing with them in two games? It's been two days and I still haven't received that one, whereas others said they got it the day after.
Same for both of the Rakan/Xayah icons. The event ends on Apr 26th, and all of the icons should be given out within 2 weeks of the event ending.
Thank you! if i havent got my icon until may 10 ill make sure to send a ticket :)
The event concludes at 11:59 PM PDT on April 26th. It can take up to two weeks from then for your icon(s) to arrive.
